alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 8:01PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN PISCATAQUIS COUNTY THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 800 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingsbury Plantation, or 13 miles southwest of Guilford, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dover-Foxcroft, Greenville, Guilford, Monson, Blanchard, Elliottsville, Kingsbury Plantation, Frenchtown, Ebeemee, Brownville, Parkman, Abbot, Wellington, Shirley, Willimantic, Beaver Cove, Bowerbank, Kingsbury, Onawa, and Barnard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Be alert for ponding water on roadways.
